name: fullstackopen-part3-backend
description: backend for part3 of fullstackopen course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack/part3/phonebook-frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen-part3-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Jeqqe
